content: --मिश्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} respectable, worthy, distinguished. (--श्रः a gentleman, a man of consequence; (<ab>pl.</ab>) {1} worthy or respectable men, an assembly of honourable men; आर्यमिश्रान् विज्ञापयामि <ls>V. 1.</ls> {2} your reverence or honour (a respectful address); नन्वार्यमिश्रैः प्रथममेव आज्ञप्तं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; आर्यमिश्राः प्रमाणं <ls>M. 1.</ls>
